data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brailovsky, Harry (2009): Longinischus ornatus, a new genus and new species of Ozophorini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Lygaeoidea: Rhyparochromidae: Rhyparochrominae) from Guatemala. Zootaxa 2292: 65-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275307
